text_block_list.text:
One evening, I noticed Symboli Rudolf 
gazing thoughtfully over the racetrack.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer, it's you. Great timing, would you 
mind keeping me company for a moment?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's nothing too special, really. 
I just wanted to enjoy this view with you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
For instance, you can see Narita Brian over there. 
She's part of the student council ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The other day, she boldly declared, "I won't be outdone", 
and even said, "I can conquer any challenge".

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And you know what? She's been living up to those words, 
making remarkable progress every day. Fearlessly pushing 
forward, always looking ahead.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
—— The students who've joined this academy are all about 
speed, unwavering dedication to their goals, and giving their 
all on the racetrack.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Every time I witness their dedication, it gives me renewed 
determination. As the Student Council President of Tracen 
Academy, as someone who wishes to see them happy…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: … I, too, must dedicate myself.
choice_data_list: And to that end, you can't afford defeat.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Exactly, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Since I've decided to take the lead and guide, I must become 
a presence worthy of bearing that responsibility.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Our mission is clear, and that's why we need to support 
each other. For the sake of them all, as comrades 
aiming for the pinnacle together ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Hyah!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hm…? What's going on!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
—— Some students have collapsed! 
Trainer, let's go over right away!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ha… hahh… Are you two okay!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Huh!? P-President Rudolf!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Don't push yourselves. You collapsed just a moment ago. 
Can someone explain what happened?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Oh, umm, it's……

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: No, it's not what it seems! I'm sorry!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …… Huh?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Actually, um… we, uh, were just tickling each other, 
and we both ended up falling down…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
I'm s-sorry for causing trouble! 
Please don't worry about us…!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh no, you two, there's no need to panic ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: We're sorry～～～～!!
The girls ran off, looking quite flustered……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: … I guess, for now, it's a relief that nothing serious happened.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But jumping to conclusions and scaring them 
like that was a mistake. My inexperience really 
showed, I must admit… how embarrassing.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I want to build a closer relationship with the students, 
but I understand it won't happen overnight.
choice_data_list: We can work at it together.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that would be greatly appreciated. Please continue to 
provide your guidance and encouragement in the future.
